trans-unit.source: Initializes the associated <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle" /> with a .NET Context Exchange-based correlation, subject to the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextExchangeMechanism" /> specified.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle" /> associado a uma correlação baseada em troca de contexto do .NET, sujeita ao <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextExchangeMechanism" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: A context correlation is based on the context exchange mechanism described in the [.NET Context Exchange Protocol Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163882).
trans-unit.target: Uma correlação de contexto baseia-se o mecanismo de troca de contexto descrito o [especificação do protocolo de troca de contexto de .NET](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163882).

trans-unit.source: To use context correlation a context-based binding such as <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpContextBinding>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpContextBinding>, or <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetTcpContextBinding> must be used.
trans-unit.target: Para usar a correlação de contexto um baseado no contexto de associação, como <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpContextBinding>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpContextBinding>, ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetTcpContextBinding> deve ser usado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ContextCorrelationInitializer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ContextCorrelationInitializer" />.
